about_the_game:
UnLoop is an atompunk VR puzzle action based on a self-coop time loop mechanics.
Trapped within a time-looped space, you need to escape, but the solitary endeavor is impossible. Yet, with each countdown timer reset, a replica of yourself emerges, mirroring actions from prior loops.
Collaboration becomes your lifeline as you and your past iterations engage with the surroundings and each other, solving puzzles to transcend confinement. And should you (all of you!) mess up — you’ll have to eliminate the consequences and their perpetrators. Perhaps with a touch of gunfire.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 970 / R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR

short_description: You are trapped in a time loop anomaly aboard a space station while on a secret spy mission. Team up with your past copies to break free in UnLoop, an atompunk VR adventure.
